segments.text: Why do you want to eat western food so much today ? Anything special to celebrate ? Did you get a promotion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , you really forgot about it ? Think it over . It's a candlelight dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not your birthday , also not mine . Hey , come on . Just tell me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's our wedding anniversary , honey . How can you forget about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My dear , tomorrow is our wedding anniversary . We've been together for 20 years . But you never change . Always so careless ! Do you remember the thing that happened on our wedding day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . I almost missed my own wedding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . Do you know that this restaurant used to be the teahouse where we first met ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , really ! It looks so different . Our old place turns into a brand new place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you remember our first date ? I got a really special gift .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can never forget that . I bought you five candies , but I was so anxious that I forgot to give them to you . You didn't get them until we parted . Then they had already melted down for I held them the whole time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , it's really unforgettable . Thank you for making me happy all these years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are the one I should thank . You've done really great job .
segments.speaker: S2
